comment: The projective map of the GLB of a set of lattice elements ` S ` . Variant of Theorem 15.5.2 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 62. Allows ` S = (/) ` . (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
